1.title: Getting the Shot

episode of.title: Life Behind Life Below Zero (TV Series 2018– )

1.plot: Ben Mullin flies a drone in the challenging temperatures of Noorvik. The Kavik field team attaches specialty cameras to a plane.

2.title: Crew vs. Cold

episode of.title: Life Behind Life Below Zero (TV Series 2018– )

2.plot: In Kavik, extreme arctic storms make it difficult for the field team to film Sue Aikens and operate the drone.

3.title: Capturing the Yukon

episode of.title: Life Behind Life Below Zero (TV Series 2018– )

3.plot: In Eagle, the Life Below Zero field team relies upon technical ingenuity to capture specialty footage of freeze-up and break-up along the mighty Yukon River.

4.title: Getting to Location

episode of.title: Life Behind Life Below Zero (TV Series 2018– )

4.plot: The Noorvik and Eagle camera crews work diligently to ensure that their gear makes it to some of the most remote shooting locations in Alaska.

5.title: Creating a Timelapse

episode of.title: Life Behind Life Below Zero (TV Series 2018– )

5.plot: In Nenana, Benji Lanpher designs a special camera rig to capture timelapse of Jessie's Iditarod planning. Michael Cheeseman uses barrels to ratchet a special camera line that runs the length of Kavik.

6.title: Getting to Kiwalik

episode of.title: Life Behind Life Below Zero (TV Series 2018– )

6.plot: As the Noorvik field team follows the Hailstones to the Kiwalik, they are forced to fix problems with their sleds due to the harsh winter conditions.

7.title: On the Trail

episode of.title: Life Behind Life Below Zero (TV Series 2018– )

7.plot: On the Iditarod trail, the intrepid crew battle freezing temperatures and failing equipment to capture Jessie Holmes' historic race finish.

imdb.plot outline: As crews brave the wilds of the Alaskan frontier, this show flips the cameras as the Life Below Zero field team battles Mother Nature and daily dangers while filming the hit NatGeo series.
imdb.title: Life Behind Life Below Zero
